title: Swim With Entity
description: Allows this mob to follow another entity, as long as both entities are in water (swimming)

success_rate.title: Success Rate
success_rate.description: Chance to start following another entity, if not already doing so

chance_to_stop.title: Chance To Stop
chance_to_stop.description: Chance to stop following the current entity

state_check_interval.title: State Check Interval
state_check_interval.description: Time in seconds between checks to determine if this mob should catch up to the entity being followed

catch_up_threshold.title: Catch Up Threshold
catch_up_threshold.description: Distance in blocks from the entity being followed at which this mob will speed up to catch up

match_direction_threshold.title: Match Direction Threshold
match_direction_threshold.description: Distance in blocks from the entity being followed at which this mob will match that entity's direction

catch_up_multiplier.title: Catch Up Multiplier
catch_up_multiplier.description: The multiplier applied to the speed of this mob when trying to catch up

search_range.title: Search Range
search_range.description: Radius in blocks around this mob to search for another entity to follow

stop_distance.title: Stop Distance
stop_distance.description: Distance in blocks from the entity being followed at which this entity will stop following

entity_types.title: Entity Types
entity_types.description: Filters which determine what entites are valid to follow
